languages.text: Shoots a specially crafted needle that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. The target also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: A shot with a specially crafted needle, which inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. The target also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

Shoots a specially crafted needle that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. The target also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

Shoots a specially crafted needle that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. The target also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

languages.text: Выстрел специально изготовленной иглой, которая накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (6) и +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g} до конца боя. Цель также получает негативный эффект {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Shoots a specially crafted needle that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. The target also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Выстрел специально изготовленной иглой, которая накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (6) и +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g} до конца боя. Цель также получает негативный эффект {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 发射特制的毒针，施加{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（6），并施加1层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此外，目标还会被{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。上述效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Shoots a specially crafted needle that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. The target also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 发射特制的毒针，施加{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（6），并施加1层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此外，目标还会被{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。上述效果可叠加。

languages.text: Verschießt eine spezielle Nadel, die bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} (6) und +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g} verursacht. Das Ziel wird zudem 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang mit {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g} belegt. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Shoots a specially crafted needle that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. The target also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Ein Schuss mit einer speziell angefertigten Nadel, die bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} (6) und +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g} verursacht. Das Ziel erleidet zudem für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g}. Addiert sich.

languages.text: Tire une aiguille spécialement conçue pour infliger les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (6) et +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. La cible subit également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} durant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Shoots a specially crafted needle that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. The target also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Un tir d’une aiguille spécialement conçue pour infliger les effets{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (6) et +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g} jusqu’à la fin du combat. La cible subit également l’effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} durant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable.

languages.text: Dispara una aguja hecha a medida que inflige {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (6) y +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g} hasta el final del combate. El objetivo también queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Shoots a specially crafted needle that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. The target also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Un disparo con una aguja hecha a medida que inflige {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (6) y +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g} hasta el final del combate. El objetivo también queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: 特別に作られた針での一撃は、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}(6)を与え、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}+1をスタックさせる。また、対象は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}減速{/g}状態になる。この効果は累積する。
languages.original_text: Shoots a specially crafted needle that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. The target also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 特別に作られた針での一撃は、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}(6)を与え、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}+1をスタックさせる。また、対象は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}減速{/g}状態になる。スタック。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toksin{/g} (6) etkisine ve+1 {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}yorgunluk{/g} birikimine sebep olan özel imal edilmiş bir iğne fırlatır. Hedef ayrıca 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g}. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Shoots a specially crafted needle that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6) and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. The target also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.
